entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 except minus 5 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
